name: Stronger Together (RoxioxxStudios)
description:
This is my first game jam project. I made this for Brackey's 5th game jam that has the theme "Stronger Together." In one week, this is how far I got. It's not complete. There's no gameplay. But, you can walk left and right to look at the scenery. 

This game is based on my Webtoon "Butterfly Kisses" by RoxioxxStudios.

Check out my instagram to see if I ever come back to this game again: @RoxioxxStudios
